column5: Come unwind in the Texas Hill Country. This classy Texas decor is a must see!!!   Unwind on the private balcony overlooking the beautiful grounds and amenity area along the inviting waters of the Guadalupe River! Guests can enjoy private river access perfect for swimming, fishing and tubing.
column8: Beautiful Guadalupe River hideaway only 6 blocks from SCHLITTERBAHN and COMAL - Waterwheel E-303
